General.Name: Sewoon Medical Co. Ltd
General.Description: Sewoon Medical Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of medical products. Its products include wound drainage systems, urinary catheters and tubes, drainage catheters and tubes, respiratory and tracheal tubes, infusion catheters and tubes, and wound care products. The company also offers unigel, thermosens, epistim, bonastent, and other products. Sewoon Medical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Cheonan, South Korea.
